Question: On February 2, 2013, this person was awarded the AP National Football League Comeback Player of the Year Award.
Hints: Following the Super Bowl win, this person agreed to restructure his contract to save the Colts $8.2 million in salary cap space.
This person was elected to Phi Beta Kappa Society in 1997.
At San Diego, this person threw for 255 yards, 2 TDs and 1 INT in a 23–20 victory.
